msContents.summary: Palm-leaf manuscript in good condition. Clear scribal hand. Some small gaps but noting too substantial until the final folio where larger portions of the text are missing. Presumably incomplete. No differentiation between long and short 'e/ē' and 'o/ō'. No puḷḷis. Final two photos switched, so the sequence goes 48,47.

encodingDesc.p: Restored pulli and long ē/ō which are not differentiated in the manuscript. Metrical word-split made in the appropriate sections. Sandhi retained in all cases and word-split made where possible in the prose commentary. No word-split when there is overshort u-sandhi or final/initial m-sandhi. Glides retained and added to the beginning of the latter word. The is only one punctuation mark in the MS. I have rendered it as a full stop in all cases.
